summary: In this adaption of the Ibsen stage play, an idealistic physician discovers that the town's temple waters are dangerously contaminated. But with the community relying on the holy attraction for tourist dollars, his warnings go unheeded.
cast: Soumitra Chatterjee|Dhritiman Chatterjee|Dipankar Dey|Ruma Guha Thakurta|Mamata Shankar|Subhendu Chatterjee|Manoj Mitra|Bhishma Guhathakurta|Satya Bannerjee|Rajaram Yagnik|Ashok Bera|Buddhadeb Bhattacharya|Sharmi Chakraborty|Ajit Chatterjee|Purna Chattopadhyay|Arup Pal Chowdhury|Bishwanath Dasgupta|Kamal Deb|Subhashish Dutta|Prabir Ganguly|Pinaki Ghosh|Tinu Ghosh|Sourin Maity|Somenath Majumdar|Gobinda Mukherjee|Monu Mukherjee|Purnendu Mukherjee|Subhransu Mukherjee|Prabhat Mukhopadhyay|Sunil Nath|Shankar Patra|Pramod Ranjan Prasad|Kumar Saha|Masur Sengupta
title: Ganashatru
